Text: Thanks! Back after a long time, missed many good encodes...
would there be smaller encoding of this?

As written:
" ONLY for PC/PS3/Xbox/standalone mp4 capable players. 
             NOT Handhelds/iPod/PSP/Zune/clones compatible file, however, 
             some portables accept these format (TIP: upgrade firmware).
             WATCH from 6-8 ft. distance at low-res settings of display. 
             Free physics lesson: quarks are leptons. "

Basically, free format, no strict targets, smallest footprint possible, sound can be mono (here's not), could be downscaled or upscaled - and - MUST be watched as instructed.

[quark] is around for long time.
@hkoraddi: Later, when normal DVD is released. I don't know when it would be.

Thanks a lot for your constant unique piece-of-art shares...+1...
Special thanks for your integrity...
Respect and Live Long and Prosper...
Spirit...
